properties.name: management.metrics.dgs-graphql.enabled
properties.description: Enables DGS' GraphQL metrics, via micrometer.

properties.name: management.metrics.dgs-graphql.tag-customizers.outcome.enabled
properties.description: Enables DGS' GraphQL Outcome tag customizer. This adds an OUTCOME tag that is ether SUCCESS or ERROR.

properties.name: management.metrics.dgs-graphql.instrumentation.enabled
properties.description: Enables DGS' GraphQL's base instrumentation; emits gql.query, gql.resolver, and gql.error meters.

properties.name: management.metrics.dgs-graphql.data-loader-instrumentation.enabled
properties.description: Enables DGS' instrumentation for DataLoader; emits gql.dataLoader meters.

properties.name: management.metrics.dgs-graphql.query-signature.enabled
properties.description: Enables DGS' QuerySignatureRepository, if available metrics will be tagged with the `gql.query.sig.hash`

properties.name: management.metrics.dgs-graphql.query-signature.caching.enabled
properties.description: Enables DGS' QuerySignature caching. If set to false the signature will always be calcualted on each request.
